ValidationRule.description: If user selects "Complex Billing" for the field "Billing Issue Cause/Category", they must fill out the following fields: Complex Billing Product, Complex Billing Notification Date, WFM Number, Complex Billing Reason
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Billing", ISPICKVAL(Billing_Issue_Cause__c, "Complex Billing"), OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Complex_Billing_Product__c)), ISBLANK(Complex_Billing_Notification_Date__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Complex_Billing_Reason__c)), ISBLANK(WFM_Number__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If "Complex Billing" Is selected for "Billing Issue Cause/Category", then you must fill out the following fields: Complex Billing Product, Complex Billing Notification Date, WFM Number, Complex Billing Reason
